name: VR Dinosaur Pingpong
description:
This is a VR casual game. You may have played table tennis, but you must not have the experience of playing table tennis with dinosaurs. Want to have the opportunity to play table tennis PK in the virgin forest and ancient times. Intersection This game takes you back to the dense forest from a first -person perspective, and a fun table tennis game with dinosaurs. This will be a novel experience. Come and try it!

Operation method:
Adjust the height handle up/down key
Reset the position handle grip key
Passing the handle pause key
